name: Lab Escape (itch) (Eatsoap, Odin Ulvestad, Francig)
description:
LAB ESCAPE!

The last thing you remember before waking up in a dimly lit lab room, inside a broken glass vat is that you were shot during a firefight and bleeding.
If the large claw on your right hand is any indication, you have been a human test subject of unethical biological experiments.

Now you must fight the guards to get out of the laboratory.

This game was made as a project in a game development class.
